body: The character class tables show how many spells of each level each can cast per day. These openings for daily spells are called spell slots. A spellcaster always has the option to fill a higher-level spell slot with a lower-level spell. A spellcaster who lacks a high enough ability score to cast spells that would otherwise be her due still gets the slots but must fill them with spells of lower levels.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic/Divine Spells/Preparing Divine Spells/Spell Slots
name: Spell Slots
